"Hilda": "We'll explain how to use recovery items."

"We'll temporarily decrease your physical strength.
Use the Monomate that you own
and recover your strength."

"Damaged
When your HP (Hit Points) become zero,
you will be incapacitated.

As your HP decreases, you can use a recovery item
such as a Monomate, to restore your HP."

"Now let's use the recovery item, Monomate, registered in the subpalette.

You can use items in your subpalette by pressing
the number associated with them, or by pressing the <%SubPalette>.

※You can change the position of the
selector by pressing <%SubPaletteLeft>or<%SubPaletteRight>."

"Pets also have their own HP.
It decreases when they're damaged.

A pet whose HP is zero cannot right for a while.

Thus, when HP is low, swap to another pet for a while to recover HP
or use a Resta, a recovery technique, from your subpalette."
